question:
With reference to the inauguration of Indiaâ€™s second riverine Multi-Modal terminal, consider the following statements about the animal:
  1. It is a part of the Jal Marg Vikas Project.
  2. It is located on the River Yamuna.
  3. The new terminal will help in coal transportation.
Which of the above statements is/are true?
explanation: Statement 1 is correct: The terminal is a part of the Jal Marg Vikas Project. This is a project funded by the World Bank and was launched in 2017. It is for the purpose of capacity augmentation of navigation in national waterways. The first terminal under this project was inaugurated at Varanasi in 2018. Statement 2 is incorrect: The second multi-modal terminal was opened on the River Ganga. This is at the Sahibganj in Jharkhand. It is expected to provide direct employment to 300 people and indirect employment to 6000 more people. The project was built at a cost of 290 crore INR in 2 years. Statement 3 is correct: The MT project at Sahibganj is expected to enable coal transportation from the coal mines in Jharkhand. It will especially transport coal from the Rajmahal mines for domestic use at thermal power plants along the NW-1. The terminal will also transport cement, fertilisers, sugar, stone chips etc.
